review: This is the worst streaming device you can possibly buy. Amazon aims to sell you this useless product that will force you to spend more money trying to compensate for Amazon Fire's short comings. The Roku stick is a much more affordable and useful device. Apple products do not stream to the Amazon Fire at all, which makes it completely useless to the majority of tech savvy users who adore their apple products. Skip this product, buy an apple TV, Roku Stick, or Chromecast, this product will only disappoint you.
